mapper.select: SELECT A.BATCH_RESULT_ID , A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID , A.BATCH_OPERT_ID , B.BATCH_OPERT_NM , B.BATCH_PROGRM , B.PARAMTR , B.BATCH_OBJECT , B.BATCH_METHOD , B.BATCH_BEAN , A.STTUS , C.CODE_NM AS "sttusNm" , A.ERROR_INFO , A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM AS "executBeginTime" , A.EXECUT_END_TM AS "executEndTime" , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS "lastUpdusrPnttm" , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" FROM COMTN_BATCH_RESULT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_BATCH_OPERT B ON A.BATCH_OPERT_ID = B.BATCH_OPERT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM076') C ON A.STTUS = C.CODE WHERE A.BATCH_RESULT_ID = #{batchResultId}
